page.title: 13Housing and other buildings
page.content: Earliest building,Farmhouse c.1500_ 1520.Listed farmhouse,1583,3 others 1550_1650. 6 cottages built between 1580_1680. 7 cottages built between 1700_1760. 8 farmhouses dated between 1800_1861 First conversion stable to house c1820.Post house on A361 and Old Rect_ ory c1800.2 houses,5 farm cottages and school c1860.Rectory 1968,4 bungalows, 3 mobile homes.All housing pre 1800 of local stone and cob.Original thatch replaced mid c19 by slate from Trebor_ ough Quarry,11 miles away.Only 2 farms still retain thatch.School c1900 and smaller housing of stone from Kents Hill Quarry,local,now disused.Farm buildings hard to date,some very old. Little change of style,stone,cob,slate modern additions corrugated iron and concrete.Dutch barns on all farms,few buildings of architectural interest.
